tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HazardousMaterialsDisposalRecord (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  disposal_date DATE NOT NULL,
  quantity DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  disposal_method VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  regulations_met BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE HazardousMaterialsRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(255),
  disposal_date DATE,
  disposal_method VARCHAR(255),
  quantity DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE hazardous_materials (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name STRING,
    disposal_date DATE,
    disposal_location STRING,
    disposal_method STRING
);

CREATE TABLE disposal_locations (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name STRING,
    address STRING,
    contact_person STRING,
    contact_number STRING
);

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_records (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(255),
  disposal_date DATE,
  disposal_method VARCHAR(255),
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE disposal_companies (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  contact_person VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_agencies (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  agency_name VARCHAR(255),
  contact_person VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE material_categories (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)
